name: Dice Pong
description:
This is my submission to the GMTK Game Jam of 2022. 

We only had 48 hours to develop the game and the theme was "Roll of the dice". Solo, I went for a straight-forward challenging puzzle game that is easily expandable.

In case you're wondering, development took about 15 hours. I used Unity, Blender and for the audio, I used freesound.org and freemusicarchive.org.
